narrative.title: 1St Infantry Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: American infantry_division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Standard triangular infantry division for assault and exploitation operations. First US division to face German forces in Tunisia. Aggressive leadership under Allen and Assistant Division Commander Brigadier-General Theodore Roosevelt Jr.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Tunisian mountains and passes - Kasserine Pass, Gafsa area, djebels (rocky hills). Mixed terrain: mountain passes, desert plains, olive groves.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Aggressive assault tactics under Allen/Roosevelt leadership
Desert warfare experience (Algeria, Tunisia since Nov 1942)

environment.terrain_type: Tunisian mountains and passes - Kasserine Pass, Gafsa area, djebels (rocky hills). Mixed terrain: mountain passes, desert plains, olive groves.
